Description:
ELEGANT AND CLASS
Harcourts Roxburgh park , proudly presents " 26 Millau Avenue, Craigieburn.With majestic in appearance and grand in proportion, this exceptional quality built home is completed with a high level of attention to detail and is presented with modern style and flair. Offering a luxurious lifestyle, that can only be described as the perfect family living, with a well designed open and flowing floor plan.
Downstairs
# Open plan Master-Chef kitchen with stone benchtop, Splash back, ample storage in Butler's Pantry.
# Living & Dining area overlooking kitchen
# Master Bedroom with WIR and full En-Suite.
# Powder room
#Seperate laundry with storage
# Double look up garage
Upstairs
# 2nd Master Bedroom with WIR and full En-suite plus study
# two Good size Bedrooms with BIR
# 5th Bedroom With WIR
# Central Bathroom
# Family retreat
Extra Features - Refrigerating Heating and Cooling, intercom, high ceilings, floating floor boards , dishwasher and much more...
Be quick to book your inspection & secure this magnificent beauty.
Call Nada Hanna on 0404 804 542 to book your inspection today. Photo ID required for all Inspections.

Description:
GOLF COURSE CORNER POSITION WITH SIDE ACCESS
Simple, easy, comfortable living is what you will experience when you live at 71 Axminster Drive, Craigieburn. From the moment you enter, youll be impressed by its presentation and practical floor plan. The chic interior comprises 4 functional bedrooms, master with walk in robe and ensuite. The adjacent bedroom can couple as a study or flawless nursery, whilst the rear bedrooms comprise ample storage space and are conveniently located to the spacious main bathroom.
The centrepiece of the home is the open plan kitchen, meals and family room which effortlessly brings the whole family together. Filled with loads of natural light, the living area opens onto the undercover alfresco creating a seamless indoor/outdoor connection, the perfect place to relax and enjoy.
Situated on a corner allotment the property has dual access with side gates allowing smart access for boats, caravans and trailers. Other features include: Bi-fold doors, 900mm appliances, dishwasher, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, and much more. Positioned only minutes to walking tracks, lakes and transport this is quiet neighbourhood that you want to live in.
*We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable; however, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective buyers are advised to carry out their own investigations.*
Insights: 71 Axminster Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Built to Inspire Display Home Quality!
For Sale and on Display, come and inspect this quality display home, and explore the excellence on offer from a local boutique builder. Experience his passion for quality through a cleverly executed and well thought out floor plan. Extremely unique, you will not see another like this in Craigieburn. If you like what you see, and this design is not for you, let us know, and we will arrange to sit down in a relaxed environment and discuss in person with the builder directly, to create a custom designed masterpiece especially for you, like no other.
- Grand Façade with a Commanding' presence
- 506m2 (Approx.) with fully landscaped low maintenance gardens.
- Four generous bedrooms, two stylish bathroom (+powder-room) on 32sq of floor space
- Designer gourmet kitchen 60mm stone bench tops, 900mm SMEG S/S appliances, breakfast bar and large walk in pantry
- Multiple living areas for privacy and sanctuary
- Ducted heating, evaporative cooling and alarm system
- Oversized double garage with extended height doors (& drive-thru access to rear)
- Large laundry, 40mm Stone bench tops with overhead cupboards, and room for ironing board
- Centrally located closed to all major amenities.
Modernistic Constructions
"Locally available Modernistic Constructions cleverly design and build modern homes to suit our clients' needs and their lifestyle. Our passion for building quality homes transpires through our exceptionally high standards, using only the highest quality building materials and craftsman to guarantee you a stunning new home. Our team believes in inspiring our clients, priding ourselves on our superior customer service and making each project a unique and exciting experience.
If you're looking for proven talented builders who care about creating the perfect home then we would love to meet with you for an obligation free consultation"
Insights: 33 Hues Street, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Land Features

Description:
Stylish, safe, spacious
Awash with natural light over two levels, this spacious 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhouse offers family-friendly luxury with an affordable price tag.
Designed for entertaining not maintaining, enjoy wide-reaching living/dining, and a deluxe kitchen with stainless-steel appliances and an oversized breakfast bar.
Take advantage of a separate laundry, a WC on both levels, handy storage under stairs, and a low-maintenance courtyard complemented by a landscaped garden.
3 large bedrooms, main with WIR and ensuite, 2 with BIR
Luxurious family-sized bathroom with bath and walk-in shower
Split-system heating and cooling
Remote-controlled double garage with courtyard entry
Perfectly positioned for convenience, stroll to all the shopping choice of Craigieburn Central, Willmott Park Primary School, and Splash Aqua Park.
For more information, please contact Alex Melnychuk today.

Description:
Entertainer's Delight!
Step inside this stunning and visually spectacular ex-Carlisle display home and make it yours. Built to the highest standards with no expense spared, this beautiful contemporary home offers class and sophistication.
A luxury residence which lavishes the family with state-of-the-art inclusions, its flawless craftsmanship and abundance of space it what truly sets this home apart.
Its clever design and impressive floor plan come complete with four living spaces, four bedrooms and a study. Sitting on a 14m wide block, here's your chance to experience true opulence every step of the way.
The generous kitchen is adorned with Caeserstone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances, and a huge butlers pantry catering to all your hosting needs.
With no shortage of room, the huge outdoor entertaining area boasts a timber-lined ceiling, quality timber decking, and is fitted with an outdoor fireplace perfect for entertaining no matter the season.
The master wing is a sight to behold, creating the ultimate parents' haven encompassing a premium dressing room, and an ensuite resembling a five-star resort. Fit for kings and queens, get ready to live like royalty.
Close to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, the new Craigieburn Homemaker Centre, Highlands Lake Park and Cafe, childcare centres, public transport, schools, and the Splash Aquatic Centre, this fantastic location perfectly caters to the entire family.
Other Outstanding Features include:
- Double Garage with Split System Heating/Cooling
- Landscaped Gardens with Timed Irrigation to Garden Beds
- Feature stained Hardwood Open Riser Staircase
- Downlights and Feature Lighting
- Zoned Alarm System
- Ducted Heating and Refrigerated Cooling
- Gas Log Fireplace to Lounge
- 2400mm High Timber Entertainer Doors to Alfresco
- Porcelain Tiles
- Extra Heavy Duty Carpet with Premium Underlay
Internal area
335m²
Insights: 27 Vantage Boulevard, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Luxury Living With Mt Ridley Prestiege
Surrounded by landscaped gardens on a huge elevated block (680m2 approx), this two-storey family showpiece presents an aspirational lifestyle of quality & versatility with its first-class features, terrific indoor/outdoor entertaining spaces & exclusive Mt Ridley location.
Practically designed, this gorgeous family home simply commands your attention. From the moment you walk in, you'll be impressed by the wide entrance & a free-flowing floor plan. Offering five bedrooms, formal lounge, beautifully updated kitchen includes wide stainless steel appliances, walk-in pantry & dishwasher and the presence of meals/family area provides a great living space for the whole family.
Downstairs also features a theatre room to enjoy, another separate living zone with bi-fold door, spacious bathroom, storage area and a huge undercover entertainment area highlights the home's practicality and functionality for everyday family living.
Master bedroom with a spa bath, double vanities, a generous walk-in robe for all of your fashion accessories, your very own private balcony with breathtaking city views, four more bedrooms with built-in robes serviced by a central bathroom.
Stepping outside is where you will find the swimming pool, complete with decked BBQ area and low maintenance backyard.
Extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, video intercom, alarm, remote control garage with extra space for a workshop, laundry with ample storage and split system heating/cooling.
Positioned in the prestigious Mt Ridley Estate, it's within walking distance to all surrounding amenities including shops, schools, cafes, public transport, parkland, post office, highlands hotel, easy access to Hume Fwy and a short drive to Craigieburn central shopping centre and train station.
Insights: 10 Eagleview Way, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 51 other 5 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
IMMACULATE FAMILY HOME WITH ELITE ADDRESS
This beautifully presented home offers floorplan versatility & first-class features highlight the allure of this sensational family home providing absolute quality & style in one of Craigieburn's most aspirational neighbourhoods
Cleverly zoned for large scale gatherings, the home comprises of 4 large bedrooms all equipped with timber flooring, master bedroom with walk in robe, ensuite with double vanity & balcony looking over parkland, 2 bathrooms & separate toilet downstairs, kids retreat upstairs, separate formal lounge room & a fully equipped kitchen with 900ml stainless steel cooking appliances, dishwasher & ample cupboard space overlooking a spacious meals area & family room along with a sensational along with a sensational balcony from the upstairs master hosting amazing views of the lake & greenery of Malcolm Creek Park.
Outside, a fabulous enclosed alfresco entertaining area & wonderfully private backyard garden offering low-maintenance ease. Surrounded by other homes of quality & class, it also offers easy access to Craigieburn's best facilities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Precinct, Schools, Splash Aquatic Centre, Medical Services, parks & trails, public transport & so much more!
Expect all the modern features which include a double remote garage with internal access, high ceilings, alarm system, evaporative cooling/ducted heating, & ducted vacuum. Come inside and appreciate the amazing size of the home and all it has to offer!

Description:
A Home Full Of Charm & Character
Be enticed by this beautifully presented home with both style and comfort, all set in a perfect location. Walk in and be invited by the spacious lounge creating a sense of intimacy with it's open fireplace, bay window, plantation shutters and a bright garden prospective.
Including 3 bedrooms, semi-ensuite to main, central bathroom, full size laundry, practical kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and roomy adjoining meals area. Step outside and be pleasantly surprised with a very private outdoor space, impressive in size, and including a fully established lush garden.
Located to please, this home is within walking distance to Craigieburn Train Station, bus stop (on Hothlyn Drive), both primary and secondary schools, local parks and Aitken Creek trails, it's also close to childcare centres and kindergartens, local shops, choice of shopping centres and easy freeway access.
Additional features include, oversized lock-up carport, heating, cooling, cathedral ceiling, designer lighting features and much more. A perfect home for first home buyers, investors, or those looking to downsize.
Insights: 56 Hothlyn Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Family Home With A Location To Match
It is our pleasure to present this Near New Perfect Family Home In Lakeside Estate Craigieburn. This home is immaculately presented with all the modern frills, impressive features and comfort for everyone.
This Home Design has a striking street appearance. Offering 4 bedrooms master with ensuite and walk in robes remaining bedrooms enjoy built in robes & bedroom 4 with two-way bathroom.
Desirably situated close to Parks, new schools, child care centre, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, this home gives value a whole new meaning.
The carefully considered open plan layout maximises the utility of the area, and creates a home able to meet the needs of a busy and growing family.
The family and dining room are complemented by a direct access to the outdoor alfresco, providing this unique property to offer simple pleasures in an impressive manner.
Let's not forget to mention Study, neat and elegantly designed kitchen, ideal for entertaining, featured with 900mm S/S appliances, 40mm stone benchtops, soft close drawers, Dishwasher and WIP.
The alfresco leads you to the back yard with low maintenance, delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation or family gatherings.
Other features include - Ducted Heating, Evaporative Cooling, Downlights, High Celling, High Doors, Double remote garage with internal/ external access, Stone to bathrooms & laundry and good size rear yard.
*FHOG available for eligible buyers.
Don't miss out.

Description:
Immediate Family Appeal on Approx 645sqm of Land!
In an established Craigieburn neighbourhood renowned for its larger allotments and outstanding urban convenience, this single-level home presents a value-packed family lifestyle opportunity with its versatile floorplan, quality features and surprisingly big backyard.
Impeccably-presented interior comprises 3 double bedrooms (master with walk-in robe), private ensuite and main family bathroom complete with spa bath.
Add to this a light-filled lounge leading through to the open family/dining area and contemporary kitchen with soft-close drawers, stainless steel appliances and ample cupboard space.
Other highlights of the home include ducted heating and split-system a/c, CCTV, family-sized laundry and impressive 20-panel 5kW solar power system.
Step outside to discover a wonderfully wide backyard including undercover entertaining area and oversized studio/guest room, plus double garage and additional front off-street parking.
The open spaces of Morgan Park across the road, it's also walking distance to Hothlyn Drive buses, primary and secondary schools, it's also close to kinder and childcare facilities, Aitken Creek trails, Craigieburn Station as well as easy freeway access.
Insights: 16 Whitley Crescent, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2019 and 245 other 3 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Family Excellence with Indoor Style to Match!
In a family-focused Highlands neighbourhood with parklands right at the end of the whisper-quiet street, this freestanding 4 bedroom home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle of contemporary quality, floorplan flexibility & urban practicality.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's inviting interior comprises a master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 3 additional bedrooms & spotless central bathroom. Dual living zones include a separate lounge & spacious open-plan family/dining area accompanied by a well-appointed, stone-topped kitchen complete with stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher.
Other features include ducted heating & evaporative cooling, family-sized laundry, rear outdoor deck, internally-accessed double garage (remote-controlled) & much much more!
Moments from both Thorngrove Reserve, the owners favourite Golden Moth Park, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, public transport, popular primary & secondary schools as well as a choice of shopping centres including Highlands & Craigieburn Central.

Executive Lifestyle With Class
Experience the luxury of this masterpiece that captures the very essence of quality workmanship. Finished to perfection and attention to detail, designed and created for space, comfort and enjoyment in the Malcolm Creek Estate .
This grand residence sitting on an attractive allotment of 736m2 (approx.) located in the highly sought after Malcolm Creek Estate in Craigieburn, could now be yours. Being presented for the first time, the home boasts sweeping open spaces and is striking both inside and out. Upon entrance be greeted by the gorgeous formal living area which leads up to the open plan kitchen/meals/second living.
This magnificent home also comprises of:
-4 good size bedrooms with BIRs and spacious master with ensuite and WIR
-2 bathrooms
-3 living areas
-double lock up garage with internal access
-stunning kitchen with 900mm cooker and plenty of cupboard space
-relaxing enclosed entertaining area adjoining a large rear yard
-evaporative cooling and ducted heating
-water tank at the rear of the property
-x12 Solar panels
Combine all this with near access to shops, schools, transport and park land. An inspection is a must!

Description:
The Potential Is Huge!
Positioned in the heart of Craigieburn on a generous 650m2 block, this home presents many fantastic opportunities. Currently leased out for $1,543 per calendar month until February 2020 investors will have rental income from day one.
This charming property offers a formal lounge, formal dining area, kitchen with ample storage space and updated appliances, dining area and another family living area. The property also has three bedrooms, central bathroom with separate toilet and laundry. Extras in the home include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and garden shed.
Outside there is an abundance of space, with only your imagination holding you back. A large carport extends into the backyard perfect for jet skis, boats and trailers to be stored or ideal to use as an outdoor entertaining area.
If an investment on a large block is what you are looking for then look no further. Call James on 0466 642 032 or Aiden on 0499 901 401.

Description:
Low Maintenance Style In A Prime Location
Nestled in a prime pocket surrounded by amenities including Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre, Public transport, Cafes, Parks, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, a choice of primary and secondary schools and its handy to all that Craigieburn has to offer. This modern light filled low maintains townhouse enjoys a contemporary and stylish design and will deliver an outstanding opportunity to live in, downsize or let out.
Comprising:
- 4 good size bedrooms all with BIRs, master with ensuite and walk-in robe
- Spacious open plan living and dining area
- Kitchen with stainless steel appliances gas cook tops, stone bench tops, dishwasher and cupboards space.
- Sliding stacker door accessing the court yard
- Alfresco entertaining area overlooking easy-care court yard
- Laundry room & extra storage
- Split system, 4 heating units (1 in each room)
- Double lockup remote control garage
Inspect today move in tomorrow, you wont be disappointed

Description:
A Spacious Surprise In Mt Aitken
Nestled perfectly near the peak of Mt Aitken, this perfect four bedroom plus study is perfect for all home buyers or the astute investor with low maintenance in one the most sought after pocket of Mt Aitken. The size and quality of the master bedroom will satisfy the fussiest of buyer's standards, with its own private luxurious ensuite and walk in robe. Bedrooms 2, 3 and 4 are of excellent size all with BIR, rumpus room, designer kitchen with tiled splashback, stone benchtops, quality 900mm s/s appliances, dishwasher and large walk in pantry with adjoining meals and family rooms. This open plan design emphasises the heart of your home, ensuring you are the envy of all your family and friends.
Other features include ducted vacuum, Security Alarm System, spa, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, skylight. with fully landscaped front yard and backyard, drive through double garage with remote entry. This beautiful home will not last long.. Within close proximity to local schools, parks, sporting facilities, walking trails and major shopping centres.
Opportunity awaits! Enquire Now!

Description:
One more SOLD by SKAD before auction!! More properties Wanted !!
Location Perfect - 6 minutes walk to Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre. Low
maintenance family home, massive 650 square metre allotment approx. Suit: first
home buyer, growing family, savvy investor. Consider S.T.C.A with approval. 'Larger
than average home for this location' Dreaming of space? Good size 3 bedrooms
(possible 4th), providing dining, family & entertainment areas. Pergola area, space
for future pool, playground or granny flat. Multiple off street parking options. Access
to shopping, Bus, Train, Freeway & excellent schools. Take your pick, make it yours
- inspect now!
Please do not hesitate to call Deepak 0477 589 549 or Dave 0430 327 172 for any further
information or book a private inspection.
